title: Detective Conan: Shadows of the Night
premise: In the dark alleys of London, a sinister robbery leads to a brutal murder. Detective Conan is on the case, unraveling a web of deceit, danger, and dark secrets.

shotlist.description: A quiet, eerie night in North London, the camera pans over a dark, suburban house.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A suburban house at night, under the shadowy light of a street lamp, creating a suspenseful and eerie atmosphere.

voice_over.text: A silent night shattered by greed...

shotlist.description: Inside, a man, Olsi Kuka, sleeps unaware of the looming danger.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Interior of a modest bedroom with a man sleeping peacefully, unaware of the shadowy figures approaching from the window.

voice_over.text: Unaware of the shadows creeping closer...

shotlist.description: Silhouettes of armed robbers, knives glinting, quietly approach the house.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Dark silhouettes of several armed individuals, with subtle glints of metal from their knives, approaching a house under the cover of darkness.

voice_over.text: Armed and dangerous, they come with a plan...

shotlist.description: A sudden, violent entry as the door is kicked open, startling Olsi from his sleep.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A violent scene as a door bursts open with a loud bang, a man in bed startled awake with fear in his eyes.

voice_over.text: Wake up, time to pay the price!

shotlist.description: A brutal struggle ensues in the bedroom, flashes of knives and desperate cries.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A chaotic struggle in a small bedroom, flashes of knife blades, and a man desperately trying to defend himself.

voice_over.text: Get him, don't let him scream!

shotlist.description: Conan arrives at the crime scene the next morning, surveying the chaos with a grim expression.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A young boy detective, Conan, standing in a messy, crime-ridden bedroom, observing the scene with a serious and thoughtful expression.

voice_over.text: The aftermath tells a dark tale...

shotlist.description: Flashback to the planning of the heist, conspirators gather around a dimly lit table.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A dimly lit room where several shady characters lean over a table covered with maps and plans, plotting quietly.

voice_over.text: Everything must go according to the plan.

shotlist.description: Conan, analyzing evidence, makes a critical connection, his eyes lighting up with realization.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Close-up of Conan, his eyes wide with realization as he examines a piece of evidence under a magnifying glass.

shotlist.description: A tense confrontation between Conan and the main antagonist, Jin, in a shadowy alley.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A tense face-off in a dark, narrow alley, Conan standing determinedly opposite a menacing figure, Jin, under a flickering street light.

voice_over.text: You can't hide in the shadows forever...

shotlist.description: A rapid montage of action sequences: chases, close calls, and narrow escapes.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A rapid sequence of action-packed scenes featuring chases across rooftops, near-misses with vehicles, and narrow escapes from grasping hands.

shotlist.description: The final showdown in a deserted warehouse, Conan and the robbers in a dramatic standoff.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A large, deserted warehouse with high ceilings, Conan stands in the center, surrounded by the robbers, all poised for a final confrontation.

shotlist.description: Conan cleverly disarms the robbers using his gadgets, outsmarting them.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan, using a variety of small, high-tech gadgets, cleverly disarming the robbers who look on in shock and confusion.

shotlist.description: As the police arrive to arrest the robbers, Conan watches from the shadows, a small smile playing on his lips.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: The scene shows police officers handcuffing the robbers as Conan watches from the shadows, a small, satisfied smile on his face.

shotlist.description: The screen fades to black, and the title 'Detective Conan: Shadows of the Night' appears with dramatic music.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: The screen fades to black with the movie title 'Detective Conan: Shadows of the Night' appearing in bold, dramatic font, underscored by intense, suspenseful music.

voice_over.text: The truth lurks in the shadows...
